title: 0xLoky Introduces AI-powered Intel for Crypto Data & On-chain Insights
body: 0xLoky , an advanced AI-powered analytics platform developed by DappLooker , enhances on-chain data analysis in DeFi through autonomous trading and AI-driven insights. Loky transforms raw blockchain data into actionable intelligence for traders, investors, and developers by combining AI and blockchain technology, making on-chain data analysis effective and easy to accomplish. They launched what is uniquely known as LQA (Loky Quantum Analysis). LQA provides fundamental and technical analysis of almost all of the ecosystems in the current crypto landscape. For example, it covers the analysis using visualizations of a variety of protocols, meme tokens, signals of upcoming token launches, etc. Loky‚Äôs Team The doxxed Loky team consists of 16 members, comprising blockchain experts, AI developers, and seasoned crypto analysts who previously built DappLooker, a leading blockchain analytics platform. Their expertise ensures that Loky Quantum Analysis (LQA) remains cutting-edge, continuously evolving with AI-driven DeFi intelligence. Team Page: Here Loky‚Äôs Partners 0xLoky is a core component of the VaderAI Small Cap DAO, collaborating with key DeFi projects to strengthen its AI-driven infrastructure: Virtuals.io ‚Äì A next-gen AI-powered ecosystem supporting advanced DeFi automation and analytics. The Graph ‚Äì Decentralized indexing for Web3 data. CoinGecko ‚Äì A leading crypto market data aggregator providing real-time insights and token analytics. Stakecraft ‚Äì Secure and scalable staking solutions. UniLend Finance ‚Äì A permissionless lending and borrowing platform. Sentient ‚Äì Empowering communities to create open, community-aligned AI. Wormhole ‚Äì A cross-chain messaging protocol connecting multiple blockchain networks. CookieDAO ‚Äì A decentralized autonomous organization focused on community-driven projects and initiatives. These integrations work to ensure Loky remains at the forefront of AI-driven DeFi analytics. Loky‚Äôs Growth and Solana Expansion Loky Agents will be deployed on different blockchain ecosystems, marking a leap in their mission to empower AI-driven intelligence across ecosystems. With its expansion to Solana, the platform aims to enhance data analytics and automation within the Solana ecosystem. Loky has seen notable adoption in the DeFi space $12.4 million ATH market cap Over 2 million impressions on X 94,000+ token holders 6,000+ active community members What Makes Loky Unique Unlike traditional market explorers, Loky Quantum Analysis (LQA) Alpha Explorer provides real-time, AI-powered insights like, Sentiment Analysis ‚Äì Provides insights into market perception related to AI agents, tokens, and protocols. Fundamental Analysis ‚Äì Offers in-depth evaluation of projects with detailed protocol insights. Smart Money Tracking ‚Äì Identifies activity patterns of large token holders and institutional participants. LQA Indicator ‚Äì A ranking system designed to support informed decision-making. These AI-driven insights enable traders, analysts, and investors to make informed decisions in a volatile market. Loky Quantum Analysis Loky Quantum Analysis (LQA) delivers a comprehensive view of the market, offering: Smart Money Signals ‚Äì Observes large transactions and wallet activity. Developer Wallet Insights ‚Äì Tracks developer interactions to provide project activity indicators. Market Trend Indicators ‚Äì Highlights support and resistance levels, liquidity patterns, and momentum shifts. Social Sentiment Metrics ‚Äì Assesses community engagement and sentiment trends in real-time. These tools provide users with a strategic advantage in DeFi trading and investment. Real-Time Signals for Data-Driven Decisions Loky offers customizable real-time alerts, allowing users to respond to market changes efficiently: Price Movement Alerts ‚Äì Detects notable price fluctuations across AI tokens. Market Cap Alerts ‚Äì Highlights emerging projects within the DeFi space. Red Pill Alerts ‚Äì Identifies AIFi and DeFAI tokens with growth potential ahead of wider recognition. Whale Signals ‚Äì Tracks large transactions from high-value wallets and institutional participants. CoinGecko Listings ‚Äì Provides updates on newly listed tokens on CoinGecko. Loky Advocate Reward Program (LARP) To foster community engagement, 0xLoky has launched the Loky Advocate Reward Program (LARP), offering 1 million $LOKY in potential rewards. Participants can get rewards by contributing to the ecosystem through various activities. Users can learn more about LARP here The Future of Loky: AI-Powered DeFi Innovation 0xLoky‚Äôs roadmap outlines ambitious developments for the platform‚Äôs evolution: Phase 1: Quantum Analysis Expansion: Enhancing LQA with deeper on-chain data and advanced technical indicators to establish it as the industry benchmark. Phase 2: AI-Driven Data Hub Development: Deploying Loky‚Äôs data APIs and integrating DappLooker‚Äôs AI Studio for natural language queries. Phase 3: Autonomous Trade execution: Training AI models on high-performing wallet strategies, launching semi-automated trading portfolios, and introducing revenue-sharing for token holders. Phase 4: Ecosystem Expansion: Expanding blockchain support, adding enhanced visualization tools, and launching Telegram & Discord DataBOTs for real-time updates. Long-Term Vision Loky‚Äôs long-term vision aims to offer: Multi-Chain Insights: Expanding support across blockchain ecosystems for a comprehensive market view. Automated Trade Execution: Enabling AI-powered swaps, staking, and intent-based actions. Autonomous AI-Powered DeFi Agents: Building privacy-focused agents using Trusted Execution Environments (TEE) and decentralized governance. About 0xLoky 0xLoky , developed by DappLooker , is a powerful AI-driven platform providing deep, actionable insights for DeFi traders, investors, and analysts. With real-time analytics, customizable alerts, and powerful AI tools, Loky is designed to simplify complex on-chain data, helping users navigate the fast-paced world of decentralized finance. title: US state Bitcoin reserve bills will pour $23B into the market if approved
body: Twenty US states are pushing for Bitcoin reserve bills, and if passed, they could throw $23 billion (247,000 Bitcoins) into the crypto market, according to a prediction from VanEck analyst Matthew Sigel that was posted on X today. Massachusetts, Ohio, Texas, Illinois, Arizona, Iowa, Maryland, New Mexico North Carolina, and Florida among others have already introduced Bitcoin reserve bills , and more (like Utah and Montana) are debating drafting theirs, as you can see in the image below. Source: @matthew_sigel on X The proposed plans would funnel state money into reserve funds and pension plans, with investments ranging from $50 million to over $8.7 billion per state, depending on how much cash they‚Äôre willing to commit. On January 23, just 3 days after president Donald Trump‚Äôs inauguration, he signed an executive order creating a federal crypto advisory council. Standing beside Trump in the Oval that day was David Sacks, the White House Crypto Czar, who then shared that the advisory council ‚Äúevaluating‚Äù a national Bitcoin strategic reserve, as Cryptopolitan reported . During his campaign, Trump promised to make America a leader in Bitcoin and called himself the ‚Äúcrypto president.‚Äù Right now, he is working to reverse SEC policies that restricted digital assets and is setting up new rules to support Bitcoin adoption, according to a report from Bloomberg. Some states like Maryland plan to buy Bitcoin using general state funds, while others like North Dakota are looking at donations, gifts, and even seized criminal assets to fund their reserves. While lawmakers fight over Bitcoin investments, crypto fraud is skyrocketing. A Chainalysis report released yesterday estimates that crypto scam revenue hit $9.9 billion in 2024. That number is expected to rise to $12.4 billion as more scam wallets are uncovered. One of the most profitable scams was pig butchering, where scammers pose as investors or romantic partners, build trust through social media and dating apps, and trick victims into putting their money into fake crypto schemes. According to the report, once the money is sent, the scammer vanishes. Elad Fouks, head of fraud products at Chainalysis, said scammers are using Generative AI to make their operations more convincing and harder to detect. ‚ÄúGenAI enables the generation of realistic fake content, including websites and listings, to power investment scams, purchase scams, and more, making these attacks more convincing and harder to detect,‚Äù Fouks said. As states move toward buying Bitcoin, scams and fraud continue to rise, creating a high-stakes environment for both governments and crypto markets. title: Why Remittix Is Set To Continue Outperforming PEPE & SHIB This Year As It Hits 3x Gains
body: Few things excite crypto traders more than stumbling upon the next explosive token‚Äîyet meme coins like PEPE and Shiba Inu (SHIB) often ride quick hype waves before sinking just as fast. In contrast, Remittix (RTX) is showcasing a more durable trajectory, boasting 3x gains so far this year and continued momentum. With almost $12 million raised and more than 460 million tokens sold Remittix is priced around $0.0539 and has outpaced the hype-laden tokens by delivering real-world utility. Below is a closer look at how Remittix (RTX) keeps outperforming PEPE and SHIB and why it could remain on top for the rest of 2025. PEPE & SHIB: Spectacular Runs, Swift Corrections PEPE and Shiba Inu turned heads by multiplying in value seemingly overnight, minting early adopters into overnight millionaires. The flipside of that success? Extreme volatility. Both meme coins rely on social-media stunts, viral tweets, and the fervor of online communities. As soon as influencer hype dies or new meme coins flood the scene, capital rotates elsewhere, and prices correct‚Äîoften brutally. While PEPE and SHIB both attempt to expand with NFT collections or DeFi utilities, these moves can appear reactive rather than organic. That‚Äôs not to say PEPE and SHIB lack dedicated communities; each has thousands of loyal holders who bet on another wave of mania. But the short shelf life of meme-craze surges leaves many investors wary. As a result, seasoned traders eye altcoins with day-to-day relevance, hoping to skip the whiplash typical of purely hype-driven tokens. Remittix (RTX): A Practical, PayFi-Centric Approach So why does Remittix (RTX) leave tokens like PEPE and SHIB in its dust? The key is that Remittix (RTX) solves an actual pain point: the high fees and complexities of cross-border transactions. Rather than depending on comedic branding or influencer tweets, Remittix (RTX) taps into the everyday remittance market‚Äîfamilies, freelancers, and small businesses that regularly transfer money worldwide. The altcoin‚Äôs ‚ÄúPayFi‚Äù model bridges fiat and crypto seamlessly, allowing wallet-to-cash solutions that drastically reduce overhead. Already, Remittix (RTX) has surpassed $11.8 million in raised capital and sold 460 million tokens, priced near $0.0539. This success story suggests the altcoin‚Äôs demand stems from more than a passing meme mania. If global kiosk integrations or local wallet partnerships follow, user adoption might expand in regions hungry for cheaper wire transfers. In that scenario, 3x gains could be just the start, while meme coins remain at the mercy of fleeting hype cycles. Riding the Wave of Real Utility Unlike PEPE or SHIB‚Äîwhere price surges often hinge on a random celebrity tweet‚ÄîRemittix (RTX) builds on a backbone of consistent user-driven demand. Each new holder who ditches old-school wire services for Remittix (RTX) fosters fresh liquidity and transaction volume. As more mainstream audiences discover they can preserve more of their earnings by using PayFi tokens, the altcoin‚Äôs upward trend gets reinforced, boosting price stability and growth potential. Analysts say this approach can keep Remittix (RTX) well-positioned even if the broader crypto market hits turbulence. While hype-based tokens sink when the meme fizzles, utility-focused altcoins usually hold firm. This resilience not only protected Remittix (RTX) in earlier dips, but propelled it to 3x gains so far‚Äîoutperforming flashier but less grounded meme coins. Conclusion: Remittix Poised for Ongoing Dominance PEPE and Shiba Inu made headlines with astonishing short-term run-ups, but their reliance on viral buzz often leads to abrupt crashes. Remittix (RTX), on the other hand, thrives on simplifying cross-border finance, an everyday concern for millions worldwide. With more than $11.8 million raised and a rapidly expanding user base, the token‚Äôs 3x surge is likely just the beginning of its potential. In a market starved for real solutions, the odds favor PayFi altcoins like Remittix (RTX) to continue outperforming purely meme-centric rivals. For investors tired of riding the meme-coin rollercoaster, shifting focus to tangible-value projects may be the smarter long-term play. Ready to Explore Remittix (RTX)? title: Mainstream Finance YouTuber Shares XRP Path to $100
body: Tony Edward, host of the Thinking Crypto Podcast, recently drew attention to a YouTube video by Andrei Jikh discussing the potential for XRP to reach $100. Edward believes this market cycle is very different for XRP and advised the community to have a strategy for cashing out when necessary. Jikh‚Äôs video , shared with over 2.5 million subscribers, provides a detailed analysis of XRP‚Äôs market potential, examining factors such as institutional adoption, regulatory developments, and financial infrastructure integration. This cycle is very different for $XRP . This mainstream finance YouTuber with over 2 million subscribers published the following video today. Reminder, have a cash out plan. pic.twitter.com/TfLmZdUW6n ‚Äî Tony Edward (Thinking Crypto Podcast) (@ThinkingCrypto1) February 13, 2025 XRP‚Äôs Market Performance and Adoption Jikh began by acknowledging his initial skepticism toward XRP but explained that further research led him to recognize its potential. His journey mirrors veteran trader Peter Brandt, who initially stood against the digital asset, but has now seen its potential and become a strong supporter . Jikh disclosed in the video that he holds 3,681 XRP purchased in 2017 and emphasized that his investment represents only a small fraction of his overall portfolio. His analysis focused on multiple catalysts for price growth. One of the key developments he highlighted is the increasing adoption of XRP in Japan . According to a recent NASDAQ report, 80% of Japanese banks could embrace XRP this year. Given Japan‚Äôs strong technological and financial infrastructure, this level of adoption could significantly increase demand for XRP. The Impact of ETFs and Institutional Interest Jikh also discussed the potential approval of an XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF). If approved, an XRP ETF would allow institutional investors to gain exposure to the cryptocurrency. He drew comparisons to Bitcoin‚Äôs price surge following its ETF approval. Despite the uncertainty, Jikh believes an ETF could increase liquidity and mainstream adoption of XRP. He also emphasized Ripple‚Äôs ongoing efforts to integrate XRP into global financial systems, particularly through partnerships with banks and financial institutions. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Ripple‚Äôs Integration with SWIFT and ISO 20022 Compliance Another significant point in Jikh‚Äôs analysis is Ripple‚Äôs integration with SWIFT. He noted that SWIFT facilitates over $150 trillion in annual transactions, and XRP‚Äôs potential role in this system could drive substantial demand. Additionally, he highlighted XRP‚Äôs compliance with ISO 20022, the global messaging standard for financial institutions. With banks required to adopt this standard soon, XRP‚Äôs compatibility could position it as a key player in the evolving financial landscape. Jikh highlighted multiple factors, like RLUSD, the XRP Ledger‚Äôs superiority in the crypto market, and more. He analyzed the feasibility of XRP reaching $100, estimating it would require a market capitalization of approximately $5.7 trillion. He acknowledged that this is ambitious but argues it‚Äôs possible if XRP gains substantial adoption in banking and financial systems. title: SEC Acknowledges Grayscale‚Äôs XRP and DOGE ETF Applications
body: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has formally acknowledged Grayscale‚Äôs filings to list spot XRP and Dogecoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), marking a key step in the regulatory review process. On Feb. 13, the SEC accepted Grayscale‚Äôs Form 19b-4 filings for the Grayscale XRP Trust and Grayscale Dogecoin Trust. This acknowledgment means the agency will soon begin its review, with a decision required within 240 days. The official countdown will start once the filings are published in the SEC‚Äôs federal register, a process that typically occurs within a few days. If entered now, the final decision would be expected around mid-October. In recent weeks, the SEC has also acknowledged applications for spot Litecoin and Solana ETFs, signaling a shift in its stance toward crypto-related investment products under the Trump administration. Under former SEC Chair Gary Gensler, the commission rejected at least two Solana ETF applications, while Grayscale had to fight a lengthy court battle to push for the approval of its Bitcoin trust conversion into an ETF. Bloomberg ETF analysts James Seyffart and Eric Balchunas recently estimated that the odds of approval for an XRP ETF stand at 65%, while Dogecoin has a 75% chance before the end of 2025. ‚ÄúThe pair have also given 90% odds of a Litecoin ETF being approved before the end of the year.‚Äù XRP‚Äôs approval could be complicated by ongoing legal uncertainty. Seyffart has suggested that an ETF wouldn‚Äôt move forward until the SEC‚Äôs lawsuit against Ripple Labs is resolved. Dogecoin, however, may have an easier path since it shares similarities with Bitcoin, which has already been approved for ETFs. The SEC has not suggested Dogecoin could be classified as a security, potentially making approval more straightforward.

title: SEC Acknowledges Grayscale‚Äôs Filings to List XRP, Dogecoin ETFs
body: The SEC on Thursday officially acknowledged Grayscale‚Äôs application to convert its XRP and Dogecoin Trusts into ETFs, marking an unprecedented move that could signal a shift in its approach to crypto products. The agency filed a regulatory notice seeking public input on the proposed rule change for the Grayscale XRP Trust under NYSE Arca Rule 8.201-E. Soon after, it requested comments on Grayscale‚Äôs Dogecoin Trust. SEC‚Äôs Evolving Approach Sparks Hope These developments indicate that the SEC is now more open to crypto innovations. It marks a clear shift from December, when exchanges withdrew their Solana 19b-4 applications after minimal engagement from the previous SEC leadership. NEW: There it is ‚Äî The SEC just acknowledged @Grayscale & @NYSE ‚Äôs 19b-4 filing to list an XRP ETF (this was mostly expected but officially means the clock will start soon for this and Dogecoin) pic.twitter.com/IQgTqPiiOe ‚Äî James Seyffart (@JSeyff) February 13, 2025 While new crypto ETF filings‚Äîincluding $ LTC , $DOGE, $ SOL , $XRP‚Äîstill must navigate the full approval process. However, the SEC‚Äôs initial acknowledgment is a promising sign for their future launch. Further, as the crypto market continues to mature, the SEC will also likely consider XRP ETF applications from later entrants like Bitwise, 21Shares, Canary and WisdomTree. Once Grayscale‚Äôs ETF filing is published in the Federal Register, the SEC will commence its formal review period, which can extend up to 240 days. In essence, the countdown for the SEC to approve or reject the proposal begins as soon as the filing appears in this official government publication, marking a critical step in the regulatory process. Analyst Highlights SEC‚Äôs Break from Past Rigidity Bloomberg ETF analyst James Seyffart observed that the SEC‚Äôs recent acknowledgment marks a clear departure from its previous stance, noting that filings like Solana‚Äôs were effectively denied as recently as December. ‚ÄúIt means there‚Äôs a chance,‚Äù he said. Earlier this week, he forecast that the SEC would formally recognize XRP and Dogecoin ETFs within days. He estimated approval odds of 70% for XRP and 65% for Dogecoin. He also projected even higher probabilities for a Litecoin ETF at 90% and a Solana ETF at 70%. However, Seyffart also mentioned that an XRP ETF remains unlikely until the ongoing Ripple litigation with the SEC is resolved. Recently, the SEC acknowledged applications from Canary, VanEck, Bitwise and 21Shares for spot Solana ETFs and sought public feedback. The post SEC Acknowledges Grayscale‚Äôs Filings to List XRP, Dogecoin ETFs appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Coinbase Reports Best Quarter in Over a Year After Trump Win
body: The exchange posted $2.3 billion in revenue, which is an 88% QoQ increase, with net income reaching $1.3 billion. Trading volume jumped to $439 billion, and institutional revenue grew 155% to $141.3 million. Meanwhile, Trump‚Äôs administration is reshaping the crypto regulatory landscape by nominating Brian Quintenz to lead the CFTC and Jonathan Gould to head the OCC. Both are seen as crypto-friendly picks. Coinbase Earnings Soar in Q4 Coinbase reported its strongest quarterly earnings in over a year, driven by a surge in crypto prices and trading activity after the election of US President Donald Trump. The company‚Äôs financial results for the fourth quarter were released on Feb. 13, and revealed total revenue of $2.3 billion, which was an 88% increase quarter-over-quarter. Net income stood at $1.3 billion, which also surpassed analyst expectations. Trading volume surged to $439 billion, exceeding estimates of $404 billion, while consumer transaction revenue saw a 178% increase to $1.35 billion. Institutional revenue also grew by 155% over the same period to reach $141.3 million. (Source: Coinbase ) The company attributed its year-over-year trading volume growth to heightened crypto asset volatility, particularly in the first and fourth quarters of 2024, alongside higher average crypto prices. Coinbase also recorded $225.9 million in stablecoin revenue and $214.9 million in blockchain rewards revenue. After the earnings announcement, Coinbase shares rose 8.44% to $298.1 during regular trading hours but experienced some volatility in after-hours trading by slipping 0.88% to $295.01, according to Google Finance data . Coin Metrics projected that Coinbase‚Äôs revenue will more than double year-over-year, largely due to increased trading activity in the post-election market environment. They specifically pointed to the renewed optimism fueled by Trump‚Äôs pro-crypto stance and his commitment to making the United States a leading hub for the industry. The majority of trading volume, however, continues to stem from institutional participants, as retail investor activity stayed subdued. Data from crypto research firm Kaiko indicated that retail traders accounted for only 18% of Coinbase‚Äôs trading volume, down from 40% in 2021. Despite its continued reliance on trading, Coinbase has made a lot of progress in expanding its revenue from subscriptions and services. The company is still primarily a trading platform, with trading activity still contributing over 50% of total revenue, according to Kaiko . However, analysts pointed to emerging growth in Coinbase‚Äôs subscription-based businesses. Coinbase subscription revenue increasing: Kaiko ) The supply of the US dollar-pegged stablecoin USDC on the exchange grew by 23% in the fourth quarter, providing a tailwind for stablecoin-related revenue. At the same time, Coinbase‚Äôs Ethereum staking platform struggled with declining staking participation, and experienced a net outflow of close to 1.3 million ETH in Q4. A more favorable regulatory climate under Trump could provide long-term benefits for Coinbase‚Äôs staking business, according to industry researchers. The exchange has faced a lot of regulatory scrutiny from the SEC but may see relief under the new administration. Analysts at Morningstar see the election results as a positive development for the firm. Looking ahead, Coinbase is also pushing forward with its international expansion plans. The company is currently in discussions with Indian regulators about a potential return to the market after stopping operations in the country in 2023. Brian Quintenz Accepts Trump‚Äôs CFTC Nomination Trump is not only the cause of major changes on crypto exchanges, he is also planning on changing the crypto industry as a whole. Brian Quintenz, US President Donald Trump‚Äôs nominee to lead the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), announced his nomination on the Web3 social media platform Farcaster. Quintenz‚Äô nomination could be the start of a major shift in the agency‚Äôs stance on cryptocurrency regulation. Quintenz currently serves as head of policy for the Web3 venture firm a16z Crypto, and stated on Feb. 12 that he was accepting Trump‚Äôs nomination to lead the CFTC. This is the second most powerful financial regulator in the United States after the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). His announcement is part of the sharp departure from the regulatory approach under former US President Joe Biden, whose administration pursued more than 100 lawsuits against crypto firms for alleged legal violations. After Trump‚Äôs administration took over on Jan. 20, the tone towards cryptocurrency seems to be shifting. Quintenz shared in his post that the CFTC is in a strong position to ensure the United States leads in blockchain technology and innovation. He also shared the announcement on X . Farcaster has become a prominent platform in the Web3 community. In 2024, a16z led a $150 million funding round for the decentralized social media network, which is hosted on Ethereum and has around 50,000 daily active users. The platform is primarily used by the Web3 community and serves as a foundation for various applications. Matt Hougan , chief investment officer at Bitwise, reacted to the news by predicting a positive impact on DeFi assets, and described Quintenz as a strong supporter of decentralized finance. Before officially taking the role, Quintenz has to go through a Senate hearing and win approval through a vote. If confirmed, he will replace Rostin Behnam as the head of the CFTC. In 2021, he joined the board of Kalshi, a crypto-friendly prediction market that successfully sued the CFTC under Biden‚Äôs administration to gain the right to list political betting contracts. He later joined a16z as head of policy in 2022. Quintenz is no stranger to the CFTC after he served as a Republican commissioner from August of 2017 to September of 2021. His nomination follows Trump‚Äôs December selection of Paul Atkins, another former commissioner, to lead the SEC. Jonathan Gould Tapped to Head OCC President Donald Trump also recently nominated Jonathan Gould , a former executive at blockchain infrastructure firm Bitfury, to lead the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC), which is the country‚Äôs bank regulator. The White House submitted Gould‚Äôs nomination to the Senate on Feb. 11, and if confirmed, he will serve a five-year term as Comptroller of the Currency. Gould is currently a partner at law firm Jones Day, and previously held key roles at the OCC during Trump‚Äôs first administration. He was also a director at BlackRock from 2014 to 2018. (Source: Congress.gov ) The OCC oversees national banks in the US, including major institutions like JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America, ensuring the stability of the financial system. Kristin Smith , CEO of the Blockchain Association, praised Gould‚Äôs nomination due to his experience in crypto and banking, which she believes will be very valuable assets for leading the agency. Avichal Garg , co-founder of Electric Capital, described the move as a positive step for fintech and crypto firms looking for better access to financial services. He pointed out that Gould also advocated for fair banking access for crypto companies and opposes Operation Chokepoint 2.0. Gould previously testified before Congress in 2023 by warning that regulatory actions under Biden‚Äôs administration may have discouraged banks from engaging with digital asset firms. His nomination coincides with reports that Trump officials are exploring potential changes to the US financial regulatory landscape, including folding the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) into the Treasury or merging its regulatory functions with the OCC. Another important¬†nomination is John Hurley as the Treasury‚Äôs undersecretary for terrorism and financial crimes. Hurley has invested in Bitcoin , and is expected to take a balanced approach to crypto regulation while also focusing on compliance, stablecoin oversight, and enforcement against illicit financial activities.

title: Metaplanet Secures $26.1 Million to Boost Bitcoin Holdings
body: In a sign of growing corporate interest in Bitcoin, both Metaplanet and GameStop are making headlines for their potential moves into cryptocurrency. Metaplanet, a Japanese investment firm, has raised 4 billion yen ($26.1 million) to expand its Bitcoin holdings, while GameStop‚Äôs stock surged in after-hours trading amid speculation that the company is considering adding crypto to its balance sheet. While Metaplanet has confirmed its Bitcoin acquisition strategy, GameStop is still weighing its options, reflecting the broader trend of companies exploring digital assets as part of their financial strategies. Metaplanet Raises $26.1 Million to Accelerate Bitcoin Accumulation Amidst Japan‚Äôs Economic Challenges Japanese investment firm Metaplanet has successfully raised 4 billion Japanese yen ($26.1 million) to bolster its Bitcoin holdings, marking another step in its aggressive shift towards cryptocurrency. The company announced the capital infusion through a post on its X account on Feb. 12, confirming that the funds were secured via zero-interest, unsecured, and unguaranteed bonds. The raise aligns with Metaplanet‚Äôs ambitious plan to acquire 10,000 BTC by Q4 2025 and eventually expand its holdings to 21,000 BTC by the end of 2026. At current market prices, these targets would require an investment of approximately $957 million and $2 billion, respectively. With 1,762 BTC held as of Jan. 28, the company appears poised for an aggressive buying spree in the coming months. The company‚Äôs strategic shift towards Bitcoin is not without reason. In its official statement, Metaplanet cited Japan‚Äôs challenging economic environment, characterized by high debt levels, persistent yen depreciation, and prolonged real negative interest rates. The move mirrors a broader trend among corporations, sovereign wealth funds, and even state governments that see Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and currency debasement. The EVO Fund, an investment management firm, backed the latest bond issuance. Notably, these bonds do not require Metaplanet to pay interest, making the raise an efficient way to increase its Bitcoin treasury without incurring additional debt-related costs. In a financial adjustment, Metaplanet also reduced the amount of yen allocated for Bitcoin purchases from 111.3 billion yen ($723 million) to 107.3 billion yen ($701 million). While the decrease may seem minor, it signals a strategic recalibration as the company evaluates the optimal approach to expanding its BTC holdings. Metaplanet‚Äôs pivot has yielded impressive results. Over the past 12 months: Its stock price has surged by 5,250%, attracting heightened investor interest. Shareholders have increased by 500%, with 50,000 new investors joining its ranks. The company‚Äôs market capitalization has skyrocketed by 11,800%, cementing its reputation as Japan‚Äôs answer to MicroStrategy. The parallels to Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) are undeniable. The US-based company has become synonymous with corporate Bitcoin accumulation, and its BTC-focused strategy has rewarded shareholders handsomely. Similarly, Semler Scientific, a US medical technology company, has also seen its stock price surge following its Bitcoin purchases. Metaplanet‚Äôs success may pave the way for more Japanese corporations to adopt Bitcoin as a treasury asset, particularly as inflationary pressures and currency devaluation remain pressing concerns. Beyond corporate adoption, Bitcoin is increasingly finding its way into state and national investment strategies. At least 16 US states, including Texas, Kentucky, and Missouri, are exploring Bitcoin purchases to diversify their reserves. Meanwhile, the United States federal government is reportedly evaluating the potential creation of a digital asset reserve, which may include BTC. On the international stage, Czechoslovakia‚Äôs central bank is considering adding Bitcoin to its foreign reserves, joining a growing list of nations eyeing cryptocurrency as a strategic asset. A Global Trend Towards Bitcoin-Based Reserves Metaplanet‚Äôs latest move aligns with a broader macroeconomic shift in which companies, states, and even central banks increasingly view Bitcoin as a digital gold alternative. The cryptocurrency‚Äôs finite supply (21 million BTC) and decentralized nature make it an attractive hedge against traditional financial risks. Financial analysts suggest that Metaplanet‚Äôs bold Bitcoin strategy could serve as a case study for Japanese firms navigating a challenging economic landscape. Should its stock continue to rise, more corporations may follow suit, further cementing Bitcoin‚Äôs status as a legitimate reserve asset. As Metaplanet continues its buying spree, all eyes will be on whether its BTC-focused strategy can sustain its meteoric stock performance‚Äîor whether Japan‚Äôs regulators will weigh in on the company‚Äôs unprecedented crypto adoption. GameStop Stocks Soar Amid Speculation of Crypto Investments In related news, GameStop‚Äôs stock surged in after-hours trading on Feb. 13, climbing 18% following reports that the company is considering investments in alternative asset classes, including cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. The speculation was fueled by a CNBC report citing three sources familiar with the matter. However, the report also suggests that GameStop has not yet made a final decision, as one source emphasized that the company is still evaluating whether such an investment aligns with its business strategy. GameStop‚Äôs stock price shot up to $31.30 in after-hours trading following the news but later settled at $28.36, still marking a 7% gain. The dramatic increase signals strong market interest in the possibility of a major retailer like GameStop adding crypto to its balance sheet. Interestingly, a Solana-based meme coin called GameStop (GME)‚Äîwhich is unrelated to the company‚Äîalso saw a 45% jump to $0.0027, before correcting to $0.0025, according to CoinGecko. Speculation about GameStop‚Äôs potential crypto involvement gained traction after CEO Ryan Cohen posted a picture with MicroStrategy's executive chairman Michael Saylor on Feb. 7. Given Saylor‚Äôs outspoken advocacy for Bitcoin, some investors interpreted the post as a hint that GameStop could follow in MicroStrategy‚Äôs footsteps by adding BTC to its treasury. However, two sources informed CNBC that Saylor has no direct involvement with GameStop‚Äôs rumored Bitcoin acquisition plans. Despite this, the mere association with Saylor, whose firm holds over 190,000 BTC, has driven excitement among investors. GameStop‚Äôs potential move into crypto would align with a growing trend of corporations adding Bitcoin to their treasuries as a hedge against inflation and currency depreciation. Meanwhile, at least 16 US states are exploring Bitcoin investments as part of their treasury strategies, with discussions intensifying at both state and federal levels. While GameStop has flirted with crypto in the past, regulatory uncertainty has hindered its long-term involvement in the sector. In 2022, the company launched a crypto wallet for users, but it was shut down in November 2023 due to increasing regulatory challenges. GameStop also entered the NFT space, launching an NFT marketplace, which was eventually discontinued in January 2024 over similar concerns. The company‚Äôs past initiatives suggest an openness to blockchain and digital assets, but its history of regulatory pullbacks raises questions about how far it is willing to go this time. The Legacy of the GameStop Meme Stock Phenomenon GameStop remains the most iconic example of meme stock success, having skyrocketed over 1,000% in a month during the 2021 short squeeze, when retail traders pushed back against hedge funds shorting the stock. The WallStreetBets -fueled movement demonstrated the power of retail investors in shaping market outcomes, a trend that has only grown stronger with the rise of crypto and decentralized finance (DeFi). If GameStop does indeed enter the Bitcoin market, it would symbolize another pivotal moment where traditional finance and digital assets converge. For now, GameStop has not confirmed any Bitcoin purchases, and the company is reportedly still assessing the feasibility of such a move. However, the sharp rise in its stock price suggests that investors are highly receptive to the idea of a GameStop-Bitcoin alliance. Should the company proceed, it could mark a significant shift for GameStop from a traditional retailer to a financial innovator, potentially following the path of MicroStrategy, which has seen its stock skyrocket in tandem with its Bitcoin accumulation. Whether GameStop ultimately embraces Bitcoin or not, its influence on meme stock culture, crypto speculation, and retail investor enthusiasm remains as strong as ever.

title: Bank of Montreal Invests $150M in Bitcoin ETFs, SEC Filing Reveals
body: The post Bank of Montreal Invests $150M in Bitcoin ETFs, SEC Filing Reveals appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Growing institutional interest in Bitcoin is an undeniable fact. Important it is to note that institutional players often engage in the Bitcoin market silently. One such silent engagement was exposed recently, when the Bank of Montreal, Canada‚Äôs third-largest bank by asset size, officially declined its massive Bitcoin investment in its Form 13F-HR to the United States Securities and Exchange Commission. The declaration has once again triggered serious discussions on growing institutional interest in BTC. BMO‚Äôs Big Bitcoin Bet Every institutional investment manager controlling more than $100 million in the US is required to file a Form 13F-HR to the SEC . It was this requirement that forced the Canadian banking giant to officially confess its extreme interest in Bitcoin. As per the recent Form 13F-HR filing of BMI, the bank has at least a $150 million investment in the spot Bitcoin ETF market. A spot Bitcoin ETF tracks the current market price of Bitcoin, offering investors exposure to BTC without directly holding the asset. Blackrock Leads the Way The document clearly indicates that a significant portion of the bank‚Äôs spot Bitcoin ETF investment is held in Blackrock‚Äôs iShare Bitcoin ETF ‚Äì one of the topmost players in the spot Bitcoin ETF market. According to the document, the Canadian bank has no less than a $139 million investment in iShares Bitcoin ETF. Diversifying the Crypto Portfolio The document also suggests that the bank, to an extent, has succeeded in diversifying its spot Bitcoin ETF investment. At least $11 million was distributed among other prominent players, Ark 21Shares Bitcoin ETF, Grayscale Bitcoin Trust and Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund, as per the document. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Russian Brokerage Finam to Offer Notes Linked to BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF , Exploring Bitcoin Futures Importantly, the document also reveals that the bank has even explored the possibility of the Bitcoin futures ETF market. A Bitcoin futures ETF tracks BTC futures contracts rather than the spot price. Futures contracts are agreements to buy or sell an asset at a future date and price. BMO‚Äôs Form 13F-HR document shows that the bank also has a $17,000 investment in the Proshares Bitcoin ETF, which is a BTC futures ETF. Bitcoin ETFs are driving massive crypto adoption! Read Bitcoin Price Prediction to see how institutional investments are shaping BTC‚Äôs future. Spot Bitcoin ETF Market: An Overview BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT, Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC, Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC, Ark/21 Shares‚Äôs ARKB, Grayscale‚Äôs BTC, Bitwise‚Äôs BITB, VanEck‚Äô HODL, Valkyrie‚Äôs BRRR, Invesco/Galaxy‚Äôs BTCO, Franklin Templeton‚Äôs EZBC and WisdomTree‚Äôs BTCW are the prominent spot BTC ETFs. Among these, IBIT, FBTC, GBTC, ARKB and BTC are the top five spot Bitcoin ETFs by Asset Under Management. The AUM of IBIT stands at $57.03B; FBTC at $20.57B; GBTC at $19.44B; ARKB at $4.94B; and BTC at $4.07B. It is clear that BMO primarily focuses on the top players of the spot BTC ETF market. if (subscribeStatus.subscribe_status === 1) { parent.document.getElementById('monthly_' + getcategoryId).checked = true; } } else if (subscribeStatus.notification_type === 2) { parent.document.getElementById('weeklySelected_' + getcategoryId).style.display = 'block'; parent.document.getElementById('weekly_' + getcategoryId).setAttribute('data-id', subscribeStatus._id); if (subscribeStatus.subscribe_status === 1) { parent.document.getElementById('weekly_' + getcategoryId).checked = true; } } }, error: function(xhr, status, error) { console.error('Error:', error); } }); } function logSelectedSubscriptions(categoryid) { var unsubscribemodal = document.querySelector('.unsubscribed-popup-modal .modal'); title: Peter Schiff Says Bitcoin Is Overpriced Than GameStop After GME Stock Rally
body: Bitcoin critic Peter Schiff has slammed GameStop‚Äôs decision to use its cash to buy Bitcoin. The news was enough to send the GameStop (NYSE: GME) stock soaring by a massive 20%. Commenting on this, Schiff said that Bitcoin is still overvalued in comparison to GME. Peter Schiff Slams GameStop‚Äôs Bitcoin Investment Plan Bitcoin critic and economist Peter Schiff has voiced skepticism over GameStop‚Äôs recent announcement regarding a possible Bitcoin acquisition. Schiff described the move as a ‚ÄúHail Mary‚Äù from the company, which he claims lacks a viable business plan. In his message on the X platform, Schiff wrote : ‚ÄúGameStop, a company with no viable business plan, has thrown another Hail Mary by announcing that it might use its cash to buy Bitcoin‚Äù. He further argued that Bitcoin is ‚Äúeven more overpriced than GME,‚Äù drawing a parallel between the two as speculative assets. Several global firms have started adopting the MicroStrategy playbook of adding Bitcoin to their balance sheets. Over the past four years, this strategy has yielded multi-fold returns for MSTR investors. Japanese firm Metaplanet also witnessed its stock price surge more than 4,000% in less than a year of adopting the Bitcoin playbook. However, Peter Schiff has said that just adopting Bitcoin to boost the stock price is not a good sign, if the business has no underlying strength. Will Meme GME Stock Continue to Rally? Everyone knows the massive GameStop frenzy that took Wall Street by storm in January 2021, liquidating several hedge funds in this process. Back then the GME Stock price rallied from $5 to $80 in less than a month‚Äôs time. Now that the video game retailer is considering adding Bitcoin to its balance sheet, we could possibly see yet another explosive rally in GME stock . Note that the company is still in the consideration phase for crypto investments abd hasn‚Äôt finalized yet. Last weekend, GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen shared a photo on social media platform X featuring Michael Saylor, co-founder and chairman of MicroStrategy, the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin. However, sources familiar with the matter stated that Saylor is not currently involved in GameStop‚Äôs discussions about potential cryptocurrency investments. In 2022, GameStop made a foray into the crypto space by launching wallets to manage cryptocurrencies and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). However, the company discontinued the service in 2023, citing ‚Äúregulatory uncertainty‚Äù as the reason for the closure. Next Targets for GME Since reaching a seven-month high in early January, GameStop shares have formed a falling wedge pattern, a bullish chart formation suggesting a potential upward breakout once the upper trendline is surpassed. Investors should watch the $29 level closely, as this range aligns with a horizontal resistance zone tied to multiple price points, including last July‚Äôs swing high. A breakout above $29 could pave the way for further gains, potentially driving the stock toward the $32 region. Source: TradingView The post Peter Schiff Says Bitcoin Is Overpriced Than GameStop After GME Stock Rally appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Bitcoin ETFs log fourth consecutive day of outflows, totaling $650m as BTC struggles
body: Spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds in the United States experienced their fourth consecutive day of outflows on Feb. 13, with a total loss of $156 million, primarily driven by withdrawals from Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC and ARK 21Shares‚Äô ARKB. According to SoSoValue data, the 12 spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded $156.69 million in net outflows, representing a 37.6% drop from the $251.03 million in outflows recorded the previous day. Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC led outflows for the fourth consecutive day, with $94.46 million exiting the fund, followed by ARK 21Shares‚Äô ARKB with $52.73 million. Additional outflows included: Bitwise‚Äôs BITB: $15.69 million Franklin Templeton‚Äôs EZBC: $8.35 million Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC: $6.86 million Invesco Galaxy‚Äôs BTCO: $4.81 million The only outlier of the day was BlackRock ‚Äôs IBIT, which recorded $26.21 million in inflows. Data for VanEck‚Äôs spot Bitcoin ETF was not updated at the time of writing. The remaining four BTC ETFs saw zero flows on the day. Total trading volume for Bitcoin ETFs reached $1.77 billion on Feb. 13, with cumulative net inflows standing at $40.05 billion. You might also like: Eric Semler urges Zoom to adopt a Bitcoin treasury strategy Over the past five trading days, these investment products have experienced only one day of inflows, while the other four days saw significant outflows , bringing total net outflows over the period to around $650 million. Meanwhile, Ether ETFs shifted back to net inflows on Feb. 13, with $12.92 million in net inflows led by BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT and Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC, which drew in $12.05 million and $4.64 million, respectively. Part of these inflows was offset by $3.77 million in outflows from Grayscale‚Äôs ETHE. Daily trading volume stood at $247.6 million, with total net inflows since launch at $3.14 billion. As of Feb. 13, morning Asian time, Bitcoin ( BTC ) was trading at $96,909, in the middle of a range between $90,000 and its all-time high of $109,000, which began in mid-November. Ethereum ( ETH ) stood at around $2,718, marking a 1% decline. Read more: Ethereum price forms a death cross as whales dump

title: Ripple CEO: XRP ETF Approval ‚ÄúInevitable‚Äù ‚Äì¬† Analyzing Potential XRP Price Reaction
body: The SEC has acknowledged Grayscale‚Äôs 19b-4 application for the spot XRP ETF. The agency will now review filings from Bitwise, 21Shares, Canary Capital, and WisdomTree. Brad Garlinghouse stated that the spot XRP ETF approval was ‚Äúinevitable.‚Äù The XRP token is in the spotlight as the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) acknowledged Grayscale‚Äôs application to convert its XRP Trust into a spot exchange-traded fund (ETF). Now, while this isn‚Äôt a done deal just yet, it‚Äôs definitely a noteworthy step forward. It hints at a more open approach from the agency toward crypto ETFs, as pointed out by FOX Business journalist Eleanor Terrett. According to a post on X (formerly Twitter), Terrett reminded everyone that previous attempts to launch similar products, like Solana (SOL) ETFs, ran into regulatory resistance under Gary Gensler‚Äôs SEC, ultimately leading to their withdrawal last December. However, this time feels a bit different. The SEC‚Äôs engagement with the XRP ETF application could just be a sign of a shift in stance, especially now that the US has welcomed its first pro-crypto administration on January 20th If this ap‚Ä¶ The post Ripple CEO: XRP ETF Approval ‚ÄúInevitable‚Äù ‚Äì Analyzing Potential XRP Price Reaction appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Dogecoin faces uncertainty as Lightchain AI sees strong presale activity

As Dogecoin‚Äôs future remains uncertain, investors are eyeing Lightchain AI, which has raised $15.3m in its presale with AI-driven blockchain solutions. Table of Contents Dogecoin‚Äôs current market position and its challenges Why Lightchain AI is gaining investor interest Dogecoin vs. Lightchain AI Dogecoin (DOGE) remains one of the most well-known cryptocurrencies, thanks to its strong community and historical price surges. However, recent market trends have left investors questioning whether now is the right time to buy or if newer projects with stronger fundamentals offer better opportunities. One such project making waves is Lightchain AI (LCAI), which is currently seeing strong transaction activity in its presale. Priced at $0.006, Lightchain AI has already raised $15.3 million, signaling significant early investor demand. Dogecoin‚Äôs current market position and its challenges Dogecoin has gone through many price changes, often caused by excitement and support instead of lasting use. Even though it is used as a way to pay by some shops, its wide use is still small when looked at other digital coins that aim for growth and real-life uses. One more test for Dogecoin is its growing amount. In contrast to Bitcoin, which has a set limit, Dogecoin keeps making new coins and putting them out there. This makes it hard for DOGE to keep rising in value over time unless there is a steady need. Also, competition in the meme coin world has got a lot bigger. Newer projects are using better tech and utility, making it tough for Dogecoin to stand out inÕè a changing market. One of the standout features of Lightchain AI is its commitment to decentralized governance. The platform ensures that decisions are made collectively by its community, rather than being controlled by a small group of developers or large stakeholders. This approach promotes fairness, transparency, and long-term sustainability. Lightchain AI is also tapping into a growing trend with its Memecoin Launchpad, which allows creators to develop and monetize AI-enhanced meme tokens. This opens new opportunities for users looking to innovate within the rapidly evolving crypto space. Dogecoin vs. Lightchain AI Dogecoin may still hold potential for short-term price spikes, but its long-term outlook remains uncertain due to its inflationary model and lack of fundamental utility. While it has a strong community backing, the absence of continuous development and real-world adoption limits its growth prospects. Meanwhile, Lightchain AI is showing strong momentum with its presale success. The project‚Äôs roadmap includes major developments such as governance integration, industry partnerships, and ecosystem expansion. With blockchain and AI becoming increasingly interconnected, Lightchain AI is well-positioned to capture market demand. For investors looking beyond meme coin speculation and toward future-proof blockchain solutions, Lightchain AI presents a compelling alternative. As its presale continues to gain traction, early adopters could be positioning themselves for significant gains as the project evolves. title: Michigan joins crypto reserve race with House Bill¬†4087
body: A bill to establish a strategic crypto reserve has been introduced in Michigan, making it the 20th state to consider a digital currency-backed reserve. Presented by Representatives Bryan Posthumus and Ron Robinson on Feb. 13, House Bill 4087 proposes allowing the state treasurer to allocate up to 10% of both the state‚Äôs general fund and the economic stabilization fund for cryptocurrency investments. According to the bill, the state treasurer would be responsible for directly holding and managing any crypto investments using a ‚Äúsecure custody solution,‚Äù a ‚Äúqualified custodian,‚Äù or an ‚Äúexchange-traded product‚Äù from a regulated investment company. The bill also opens the door for crypto lending, stating that if it can be done ‚Äúwithout increasing the financial risk to this state,‚Äù the treasurer may loan the cryptocurrency to generate additional returns. Additionally, the bill mandates that any taxes or fees paid to the state in cryptocurrency must be transferred to the general fund. If a payment or fee was originally intended for another fund, the treasurer is required to reimburse that fund in fiat currency equivalent to the crypto received. With this, Michigan joins 19 other U.S. states that are currently considering a cryptocurrency strategic reserve and are at various stages of legislation. You might also like: Trump open to adding XRP, Solana to U.S. crypto reserve: report Experts speculate Utah will be the first state to pass such a bill due to its 45-day legislative timeline, which is the shortest among all other states. It also benefits from a dedicated digital asset task force that has consistently driven crypto-related laws toward approval. Meanwhile, Michigan‚Äôs bill follows a similar proposal presented in the Texas Senate by Senator Charles Schwertner on Feb. 12. Commenting on the Texas bill, Posthumus stressed that Michigan should ‚Äújoin Texas in leading on crypto policy‚Äù by signing the ‚ÄúMichigan Crypto Strategic Reserve.‚Äù Michigan has previously explored crypto investments via Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds. In November, the State of Michigan Retirement System became one of the top five holders of Grayscale‚Äôs spot Ethereum ETF via a $10 million investment. This was on top of the $6.6 million invested in ARK 21Shares‚Äô ARKB spot Bitcoin ETF in July. Read more: Czech Republic might create a BTC reserve ahead of the U.S. administration. Has the crypto race started?

title: Coinbase shares jump 8% as reported revenue beats expectations
body: Shares of U.S. crypto exchange Coinbase jumped over 8% on Thursday after the company posted stronger-than-expected Q4 earnings. Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase saw its shares jump 8.44% to $298.11 on Thursday, Feb. 13, after reporting its strongest quarterly revenue in three years. According to its Q4 2024 earnings report , Coinbase generated $2.3 billion in revenue, a 138% increase from 2023, beating the $1.88 billion estimate from LSEG analysts. Net income hit $1.3 billion, while earnings per share came in at $4.68, surpassing both the $2.11 forecast by FactSet and the $1.81 expected by LSEG. The exchange says its growth was due to rising trading activity and a shift in the regulatory landscape. ‚ÄúZooming out, the last few months have demonstrated a sea change in the regulatory environment, unlocking new opportunities for Coinbase and the crypto industry.‚Äù Coinbase Transaction revenue hit $1.6 billion, up 172% from the previous quarter, while subscription and services revenue grew to $641 million. You might also like: Kraken may know Satoshi‚Äôs identity: Coinbase director Coinbase revenue as of Q4 | Source: Coinbase‚Äôs Q4 earnings report Coinbase is upbeat about its future, calling the latest regulatory shifts under the Trump administration the ‚Äúdawn of a new era for crypto.‚Äù The company says it will ‚Äúdouble down on what we‚Äôve always focused on: building,‚Äù with plans to boost stablecoin adoption, grow its layer-2 network Base , and expand crypto payments. ‚ÄúAt the same time you will see us working hard to bring more people onchain through products like our leading layer 2 platform Base, SmartWallet, and Coinbase Developer Platform.‚Äù Coinbase Still, challenges remain. Stablecoin transaction fees dropped 9% quarter-over-quarter to $226 million, but Coinbase says partnerships and new products will help balance things out. With a big Q4 behind it, the company sees an ‚Äúunprecedented opportunity‚Äù ahead ‚Äî if market conditions and regulations stay favorable. Read more: Coinbase seeks re-entry into India after regulatory setbacks: report

title: Solana Outshines Ethereum with Bitcoin Liquidity on Its Side
body: The post Solana Outshines Ethereum with Bitcoin Liquidity on Its Side appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum rival Solana‚Äôs total value locked (TVL) soared in the final quarter of 2024, according to Messari‚Äôs ‚ÄúState of Solana Q4 2024‚Äù report . It increased by 64% compared to the third quarter and by 486% year-over-year, reaching an impressive $8.6 billion. Solana is now second only to Ethereum, having surpassed Tron in November 2024. The TVL represents the total value of digital assets staked or locked within a blockchain‚Äôs smart contracts. Raydium led the charge on Solana. The blockchain‚Äôs biggest decentralized exchange (DEX) gained 86% in TVL quarter-over-quarter, closing the year with a market share of 24%. According to Messari, the DEX‚Äôs dominance is owed to memecoin and AI-related crypto trading. In spite of a slowdown in retail trading and a cooling crypto market, Solana keeps generating more revenue than Ethereum, DefiLlama reports. The gap is even more pronounced in terms of apps. Solana app revenues exceed Ethereum apps tenfold as of February 2025. This data is current even after considering the plethora of Layer-2 blockchains on Ethereum, which host a vast share of trading activity. Solana‚Äôs revenue exceeded $8.4 million on February 9, compared to $875,571 for Ethereum. Still, Ethereum has the lead in terms of TVL: just under $57 billion compared to Solana‚Äôs $9.5 billion. With Bitcoin migrating to Solana through platforms like Zeus Network, Solana is expected to surpass Ethereum in this category. Solana is winning over institutional and retail users Solana‚Äôs speed and scalability appeal to institutions like Franklin Templeton, BlackRock, and Soci√©t√© G√©n√©rale. The blockchain is built to handle up to 65,000 transactions per second (TPS), supporting highly data-intensive operations. It is uniquely suitable for institutional adoption thanks to its reliable security and low transaction costs, providing the infrastructure financial institutions need to tokenize assets, integrate DeFi into workflow, or process real-time payments. Solana is used by Securitize, one of BlackRock‚Äôs leading partners. The collaboration aims to streamline and simplify tokenization, alleviating investors‚Äô access to diverse financial products. According to Solscan, the number of active Solana wallets grew fourfold from May last year to February 2025, specifically from around 1 million to over 4 million, with spikes to 8 million on occasion. Transactions increased from 200 to 400 million, and real TPS achieved a record 4,000 last year. The shift of Bitcoin liquidity marks a turning point in Solana‚Äôs growth Zeus Network , Solana‚Äôs and Bitcoin‚Äôs flagship permissionless communication layer, offers an innovative way to tap into Bitcoin community value. Specifically, its dApp APOLLO has introduced Bitcoin liquidity to Solana. The dApp‚Äôs final testnet launched successfully on August 8, engaging over 30,000 unique addresses. Following upgrades to the Zeus Program Library, it is possible to integrate Bitcoin assets on Solana. There are currently 11 cross-chain interactions worth $16,441 in progress. Zeus Network has confirmed a total of 581 interactions so far, valued at $23.75 million. The simplicity of onboarding to Zeus is a major winning point. Users only connect their Solana and Bitcoin wallets and bind the two addresses to bring Bitcoin liquidity over. To connect a Bitcoin wallet to APOLLO, users must install one that the dApp supports, such as UniSat or Xverse. Then, they click ‚ÄúConnect‚Äù on the APOLLO platform, which also supports Phantom, Solflare, and other Solana wallets. The process of linking the Solana wallet is the same. Finally, they approve the signature request to bind the Solana to the Bitcoin wallet. Advantages of Solana‚Äôs PoH over Ethereum‚Äôs PoS Solana‚Äôs use of the Proof of History (PoH) protocol has been its primary improvement over the Ethereum network. Via PoH consensus, Solana achieves the throughput of 65,000 TPS (despite some other blockchains‚Äô higher time to finality) without side chains or second layers. The mechanism creates a record that proves an event occurred at a specific time. Solana‚Äôs validators do not agree on a time, but encode it with a cryptographic hash function instead, the SHA-256. This eliminates the need to wait for confirmation. Firedancer: an important milestone In 2025, Solana will expand to Firedancer, its fourth validator. This is a colossal network upgrade developed by Jump Trading. The new validator is expected to significantly improve upon the blockchain‚Äôs transaction processing capacity. Firedancer will allow it to process over a million transactions per second as well as enhance security. Solana processes one block every 2.34 seconds, compared to Ethereum‚Äôs 13 seconds and processing capability of 15-45 TPS. Lower fees and well-optimized smart contracts Ethereum‚Äôs transaction fees are over $1. While L2 scaling solutions and the move to Proof-of-Stake (PoS) have helped reduce them, they remain a barrier for developers and users. In contrast, Solana‚Äôs architecture enables transaction costs of around $0.02 (0.0001 SOL), making it more attractive, particularly for frequent transactions. One final area in which Solana excels involves programming languages and smart contracts. Ethereum uses Solidity as the main language for writing smart contracts. It was built specifically for the Ethereum Virtual Machine and is influenced by JavaScript, Python, and C++, so any developer with experience in these languages can learn it with relative ease. Sealevel, Solana‚Äôs smart contract platform, increases throughput via parallel processing capabilities. Most smart contracts are written in Rust, which was selected for its performance and memory safety features. It is a compelling choice for blockchain development in part due to its dedicated community. Rust is more versatile than Solidity, which appeals to creators of high-speed dApps. Solana‚Äôs advantages and the possibility of bringing Bitcoin liquidity on-chain augment its efforts to overtake Ethereum in TVL and other adoption benchmarks.

title: SEC Makes Landmark Statement On Grayscale XRP ETF
body: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has acknowledged Grayscale Investments‚Äô proposal to list and trade shares of the Grayscale XRP Trust as an exchange-traded fund (ETF), and the crypto world is anticipating its next steps. Fox Business journalist Eleanor Terrett shared the news of the regulator‚Äôs acknowledgment of Grayscale‚Äôs filing on X. This acknowledgment and potential approval could mark a turning point in the regulatory treatment of XRP, opening the door for greater institutional involvement in the cryptocurrency market. NEW: The @SECGov has acknowledged the $XRP 19b-4 filings. ‚Äî Eleanor Terrett (@EleanorTerrett) February 13, 2025 Regulatory Shift Under New Leadership For years, the SEC took a cautious stance on cryptocurrency-based financial products. Under former Chair Gary Gensler, the agency maintained that many digital assets, including XRP, should be classified as securities. This position led to strict regulatory scrutiny and prolonged legal disputes within the crypto industry. Before stepping down, Gensler‚Äôs SEC had maintained that it would not approve new crypto ETFs until the new administration took over in 2025. However, with Donald Trump now in office and his administration‚Äôs more favorable stance toward digital assets, the SEC appears to be reconsidering its approach. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Market Impact of an XRP ETF Approval An approved XRP ETF would provide institutional investors with a regulated vehicle to gain exposure to the digital asset. Although Ethereum had a muted response after its ETFs were approved, Bitcoin ETFs contributed significantly to its rise to a new all-time high in March 2024. XRP ETF approval could lead to increased liquidity, higher trading volumes, and greater mainstream adoption. Institutional participation has been a key factor in legitimizing cryptocurrencies as an asset class, and ETF approval could encourage further expansion of crypto-related financial products. With multiple financial firms having applied for XRP ETFs over the past few months, approval of Grayscale‚Äôs application could set a precedent for approvals of further listings. What Does This Mean for the Ripple Lawsuit? XRP has been in the legal battle between Ripple and the SEC for years. While the uncertainty has impacted the token‚Äôs adoption in the U.S., if the SEC approves the ETF, it could be seen as an implicit acknowledgment that XRP can be treated similarly to other crypto assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum, which now have approved spot ETFs. Terrett explained in another post that while the SEC‚Äôs acknowledgment is not an approval, it shows a shift in the regulator‚Äôs stance toward digital assets. She noted that the SEC is now more open-minded, and sees this as a good first step. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: How TRUMP and MELANIA meme coins hooked everyone
body: The post How TRUMP and MELANIA meme coins hooked everyone appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Hype, social media and strategic marketing tactics have always fueled the rise of meme coins. The recent launch of TRUMP and MELANIA tokens is a perfect example of how celebrity-backed cryptocurrencies can leverage branding, public interest and market sentiment to capture investor attention. Let‚Äôs explore the marketing strategies behind these tokens and their prospects if any left. Strategies behind $TRUMP and $MELANIA Leveraging Celebrity Influence One of the most powerful tools in the marketing arsenal of TRUMP and MELANIA tokens is their association with high-profile figures. Donald Trump, as a U.S. president and a global media personality, brings a built-in audience that transcends the typical crypto community. By aligning the tokens with his brand, the creators tapped into a massive base of supporters who are eager to engage with anything linked to Trump. The fact that these tokens are affiliated with a sitting U.S. president adds legitimacy and potential longevity to their market presence. Social media domination TRUMP and MELANIA tokens have effectively utilized platforms such as Twitter (X), Telegram and TikTok to create viral content. Memes, endorsements from influencers and coordinated social media campaigns have driven significant awareness. The hashtag #TRUMPtoken has been trending across multiple platforms, further fueling FOMO among retail investors. Scarcity and exclusivity A key marketing tactic has been the creation of a sense of exclusivity. With limited token supply and strategically timed releases (days before the inauguration), investors are incentivized to act quickly, fearing they might miss out on potential gains. This scarcity-driven approach has been successful in attracting early adopters and speculative traders. The fast listings on major exchanges like Binance and Coinbase served as another marketing hook, compelling many users to buy in when the price had already reached its peak. Technical Challenges and FOMO The imperfect blockchain infrastructure of Solana, on which these tokens were launched, inadvertently contributed to the hype. Users faced transaction failures and network congestion when trying to purchase early, creating even greater excitement and urgency to get in before prices soared. The new trend: celebrity meme coins The success of TRUMP and MELANIA tokens has set the stage for a broader trend in celebrity-backed meme coins. At first, there were speculations around potential launches such as $IVANKA, $ERIC and $BARRON but now we see other developments in this direction. Different public figures, like ‚ÄúHide the Pain Harold‚Äù with his $PAIN token (which collected $48 million on public presale), are already jumping into the crypto space, leveraging their brand recognition to fuel token adoption and speculation. Future Prospects for TRUMP and MELANIA Tokens Despite their initial success, the long-term viability of TRUMP and MELANIA tokens will depend on several factors: Market Sentiment: As with all meme coins, hype-driven gains can be short-lived without continuous marketing efforts. Integration and Utility: If these tokens can find real-world use cases beyond speculation, they may establish stronger footholds in the market. Centralization Risks: Currently, 94% of TRUMP and MELANIA tokens are held by just 40 wallets, posing a significant risk of price manipulation and potential market crashes. Regulatory Developments: Trump‚Äôs executive order to create a U.S. cryptocurrency reserve and a more favorable stance toward digital assets could provide a positive outlook for these tokens. Impact on major cryptocurrencies If assets like BTC, ETH and SOL are included in the U.S. crypto reserve, their prices could see substantial appreciation due to increased institutional demand and global recognition. Bitcoin, in particular, could benefit from its status as a ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù while Ethereum and Solana could experience renewed interest for their smart contract capabilities and ecosystem growth. Conclusion The TRUMP and MELANIA meme coins have exemplified how strategic marketing can drive demand and engagement in the crypto space. As the market for celebrity-backed tokens continues to grow, investors should remain cautious and evaluate the fundamentals behind the hype. One thing is clear: marketing is a critical factor in the success of meme coins and those who master it can captivate the market effectively.

title: TRUMP Meme Coin Skyrockets as Arthur Hayes Sees It Beating Bitcoin
body: The post TRUMP Meme Coin Skyrockets as Arthur Hayes Sees It Beating Bitcoin appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News While the top crypto coins are bloodstained, the TRUMP meme coin is making waves again, jumping 5% to $16.40 after former BitMEX CEO arthur hayes arthur hayes Arthur Hayes is a Bitcoin advocate and fintech pioneer, best known as the co-founder and former CEO of BitMEX, a leading cryptocurrency trading platform. Launched in 2014, BitMEX has traded trillions in Bitcoin and other digital assets. Hayes, a former Deutsche Bank and Citigroup derivatives trader, became interested in Bitcoin in 2013 after reading Satoshi Nakamoto's white papers. He stepped down as CEO of BitMEX in 2020 following regulatory challenges, including being the first crypto exchange charged under the Bank Secrecy Act. Hayes is recognized as the youngest African American crypto billionaire.DetailsOrganization: BitMexLocation: Hong KongEducation: Bachelor of Science in Economics, Finance from the University of Pennsylvania and Bachelor of Science in Economics and finance from The Wharton SchoolSkills: Trading and SwapsExperience:Chief Investment Officer at Maelstrom from Dec 2022 - PresentCo-Founder at 100x Group from Oct 2020 - PresentCo-founder and CEO at 100x Group from Jul 2019- Oct 2020CEO at BitMEX from Jan 2014 - Oct 2020Delta One Trader (Associate) at Citi from Jun 2011 - May 2013Associate at Deutsche Bank from Jul 2008 - Jun 2011Synthetic Equity Trader at Deutsche Bank from Jun 2008 - Jun 2011FAQ's1. When was Bitmex founded?BitMEX was Launched in 2014.2. What other roles does Arthur Hayes hold?After BitMEX, Hayes became the Chief Investment Officer at Maelstrom Entrepreneur Investor Chief Executive Officer Trader predicted it could outperform Bitcoin. TRUMP meme coin is on a strong rally, surging 13% in the past 24 hours to $16.87. It recently outperformed top meme coins like SHIB, DOGE, and PEPE, which saw smaller gains. Its trading volume skyrocketed by 102% to over $1.5 billion, signaling growing investor confidence and strong market interest. With crypto market sentiment improving, Hayes believes meme coins will play a bigger role not just in trading but also in U.S. politics. Arthur Hayes‚Äô Big Prediction Arthur Hayes has always been known for his bold market calls, and this time, he‚Äôs placing his bets on meme coins‚Äîspecifically TRUMP. In his latest blog post , he said that meme coins could become a major part of U.S. politics, acting as a unique way for politicians to engage with their supporters. He even hinted that U.S. President Donald Trump himself keeps an eye on the TRUMP meme coin‚Äôs price. Hayes also noted that if the crypto market sentiment improves, TRUMP could surge before Bitcoin. He explained that political insiders with knowledge of upcoming pro-crypto policies might start buying TRUMP first, leading to a price rally ahead of any major Bitcoin move. Why TRUMP Meme Coin Could Keep Rising TRUMP was launched during Trump‚Äôs inauguration , and it quickly became a sensation. Today, it‚Äôs the fourth-largest meme coin after Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and Pepe Coin (PEPE). Its growing influence isn‚Äôt just limited to crypto enthusiasts‚Äîit‚Äôs now being discussed in political circles as well. Hayes‚Äô prediction aligns with the growing trend of meme coins being used for more than just speculation. He believes the 2026 U.S. mid-term elections could see multiple politicians launching their meme coins to engage voters and fund campaigns.
